headline: ROSEN, A LONGSTANDING LAW FIRM, Encourages Customers Bancorp, Inc. Investors to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action First Filed by the Firm - CUBI - Customers Bancorp  ( NYSE:CUBI )
summary: NEW YORK, Dec. 28, 2024 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- WHY: Rosen Law Firm, a global investor rights law firm, reminds purchasers of securities of Customers Bancorp, Inc.
